name: NUCLEAR SPILLWAY
description: Large map, plenty of secrets & NUKAGE ! Replaces episode 3 level 1 just because I liked the sky texture in that episode. LMP included (played on skill level 3) To view place SPILLWAY.WAD & SPILLWAY.LMP into your DOOM directory and type: `DOOM -PLAYDEMO SPILLWAY -FILE SPILLWAY.WAD'
